title: Китайско-иностранное сотрудничество в управлении учебными заведениями
content: Совместная программа магистратуры и аспирантуры Нанькайского университета и Университета Глазго Nankai University-University of Glasgow Joint Graduate School is win-win cooperation between Nankai University and the University of Glasgow.The Joint Graduate School began enrolling full-time postgraduates in 2015. There are four majors being provided in the program including international relations (030207H), regional economics (urban and regional planning) (020202H), environment management, and economic (environmental management)(0830z1H), and English language and literature (050201H).
